title: Dorset and Hampshire Live: Monday 13 February - BBC News
summary: woman dies after flat fall in portsmouth .
man arrested after handgun incident in weymouth .
wins for saints and pompey with cherries playing tonight .
sunny but windy today with high of 10°c .

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: thanks for joining us .
the bbc local live service for hampshire , dorset and the isle of wight will resume at 08:00 on tuesday .
you can still get in touch by email , on our hampshire and dorset facebook pages or on twitter @ bbc hampshire and @ bbcdorset .

documents.title: b & b owners raise fears over rehab center plans
text: guest house owners have raised fears over plans to turn a neighbouring b & b into a drug and alcohol rehab centre .
dorset county council is in the process of buying basil towers in weymouth after receiving £ 620,000 in government funding for the scheme .
one landlady said she feared guests of the remaining b & bs may be put off by their new neighbours .
if any guests go on trip advisor or social media and say it 's next to a rehab place , nobody 's going to come back .

documents.title: rider dies after two bikes crash
text: rider dies after two bikes crash

documents.title: aldershot re-sign midfielder oyeleke
text: aldershot re-sign midfielder oyeleke

documents.title: bournemouth v manchester city : team news
text: bournemouth manager eddie howe will make a late decision on the fitness of defenders simon francis , charlie daniels and adam smith .
goalkeeper adam federici has been ruled out for the rest of the season following knee surgery .
manchester city manager pep guardiola has a full-strength side to choose from for the trip to the south coast .
top scorer sergio aguero will hope to earn a recall after starting the last two games on the bench
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: appeal after attack
text: police are appealing for help in tracing a man they want to speak to following an assault in emsworth .
hampshire constabulary says it wants to speak to karl gates , 26 , after reports of an assault on a 24-year-old woman in cold harbour farm road early on sunday .

documents.title: saints fans near top of the romance league
text: but bournemouth fans are showing relegation form
saints fans named country 's second most romantic supporters
romantic with ponies and relatives is nothing to be proud about !
nor is being in league two # mindthegap
i love the romance of league 2 , old school football .
mind the gap between our history and your lack of it !
is that whilst they are swearing and beaten people just over a stupid game ?

documents.title: council leaders in clean air call
text: the leader of southampton city council has signed a joint letter to the prime minister , along with the mayor of london , sadiq khan , and the leaders of four other cities , calling for urgent action to improve air quality .
the letter said vehicle manufacturers should be more accountable for emissionsand national minimum emissions standards for private hire vehicles , as well as a new 21st century clean air ac
the quality of the air we breathe is an issue which affects everybody that lives in the city .

we can only act on this issue with government support and along with the leaders of other affected areas i have written today to the prime minister requesting that action to improve air quality be prioritised . ''

documents.title: arrest over 'spitting ' incident
text: man arrested after 'two bus drivers are spat at '

documents.title: tribute to 'isle of wight surf legend '
text: dozens of surfers formed a circle in compton bay on saturday , in memory of dave gray who `` died in his sleep '' last month at the age of 52 .
matt whishaw said : `` as well as being a surf legend dave was lifeguard at ventnor beach , worked for ventnor town council and was one of the most loved people in ventnor . ''
the paddle out at compton bay today for local island surf legend dave gray who died in january .

documents.title: man dies after new forest two-bike crash
text: a motorcyclist involved in a collision with another bike in the new forest on friday has died .
two bikers , aged 29 and 48 , suffered life-threatening injuries when their vehicles crashed on the b3054 beaulieu road - between the heath roundabout and hill top - shortly after 07:00 .
hampshire constabulary said janek szarzynski , 29 , from fareham , died the same evening .
the 48-year-old man remains in a critical but stable condition .
police have renewed their appeal for witnesses .
author: Roz Tappenden
BBC South

documents.title: cherries build up for city clash
text: afc bournemouth says winger ryan fraser will be presented with the january player of the month award , ahead of this evening 's premier league match against manchester city .
turnstiles open at 19:15 gmt for the presentation and pre-match build-up , ahead of the kick off at 20:00 gmt .
congratulations @ twitterid he 's the @ twitterid player of the month winner for january !
# afcb
rightly deserved
congratulations @ twitterid @ twitterid for @ twitterid player of the month for january

documents.title: dementia couple 'still in love '
text: a dorset couple are still `` head over heels in love '' despite not always being able to recognise each other , the alzheimer 's research uk charity says .
chris warren , 72 , and his wife hilary , 69 , were diagnosed with dementia within two years of each other .
the couple , who married in 1969 , now share a room at a care home in broadstone .
their son james said : `` dad only really smiles when he 's with mum and she wo n't always recognise that that 's him .
but there is a constant familiarity there .
`` even if she does n't know it 's really him she 'll hold his hand and rest her head on his shoulder . ''

documents.title: murder arrest after fatal flat fall
text: murder arrest after fatal flat fall

documents.title: woman loses £ 6,450 to bank card thief
text: a man who stole a purse from a supermarket shopper used her bank cards to withdraw £ 6,450 from cash machines .
police have released a cctv image of a man they want to trace , following the theft in winchester on 23 january .
the thief followed the woman from waitrose in stockbridge road to the underground car park where he snatched her purse from her car .
he then used all seven of her bank cards to withdraw cash from atms in winchester town centre .

documents.title: the brook founder bryn lewis dies after short illness
text: bryn lewis who founded of one of southampton 's best known music venues , tthe brook , has died following a short illness , the venue has said .
mr lewis took over the portswood venue in 1995 and transformed the existing pub into a two-tier music venue .
his long time friend and business partner dylan will continue to manage the brook along with mr lewis 's eldest son , nick .
among the tributes posted on the brook 's facebook page , mr lewis was described as a `` true legend of the southampton live music scene '' .
he had a simple aim : to create a venue where people could have fun and enjoy live entertainment .
bryn conceived and generated a unique ethos and culture that will continue to live on and from which many , many people have , and will continue to , derive a lot of pleasure . ''
author: Stephen Stafford
BBC South

documents.title: sheep 'killed by dogs ' on hampshire farm
text: three sheep have died after a suspected dog attack on a farm at kingsclere .
police said the `` large hounds '' were caught on cctv trying to enter a chicken pen on the farm on saturday .
two of the sheep were later found dead with extensive injuries , while a third apparently died from shock .
pc vincent lane said : `` the injuries sustained are among the worst i have seen and i am concerned that the dogs ' owners do not appear to have been present throughout the incident . ''
author: Marcus White
BBC South

documents.title: watch : £ 28m leisure centre takes shape
text: a roof has been put on the new £ 28m leisure centre , due to open in late 2017 or early 2018 at fleming park in eastleigh .
the scheme will include a larger pool and expanded gym facilities , while the current centre - built in the 1970s - will be demolished .

documents.title: guest house earmarked for rehab centre
text: a weymouth guest house is to be converted into a rehabilitation centre for people with drug and alcohol problems if planning permission is agreed .
dorset county council has been given funding to buy and convert basil towers in abbotsbury road into a residential detox centre .
public health england ( phe ) has awarded £ 620,000 for the facility which will accommodate up to six people .

documents.title: flat falls 'not linked ' by police
text: the death of a woman who fell from a third floor window in southsea on sunday , and a similar incident in southampton on saturday , are not linked , hampshire police have said .
a 46-year-old man has been arrested following the fatal fall at clarendon court at about 09:40 gmt yesterday .
on saturday , a woman , who is believed to be in her 20s , fell from a third floor window in salisbury street , southampton .
she is a critical condition in hospital .

documents.title: sandbanks ferry back in operation
text: the ferry was out of action for about three hours this morning `` due to high tide/wind making boarding impossible '' .
we 're back in service now , the tide has subsided - and we 're all back running a normal service .
hi there , how 's the queue looking on the studland side , is there a backlog as result of earlier suspension ?
thanks .
no queues either side

documents.title: breakingman arrested over fall death
text: a man has been arrested following the death of a woman who fell from the window of a third floor flat in southsea .
the 40-year-old woman died in hospital after falling at clarendon house at about 09:40 gmt on sunday .
police said a 46-year-old man from southsea had been arrested and bailed until march 24 .

documents.title: 'now or never ' for pompey - stevens
text: 'now or never ' for pompey - stevens

documents.title: ferry service reinstated 'soon '
text: the sandbanks ferry has said it should be back in action shortly after suspending services for most of the morning `` due to high tide/wind making boarding impossible '' .
the ferry was due to be out of action for `` about an hour and a half '' from just before 09:00 gmt .
high tide has just passed water is on the way down so it should n't be long now : )
service suspended - service suspended due to high tide/ wind making boarding impossible .
should only be for an hour and a half
sandbanks ferry suspended `` due to high tide ''

documents.title: saints thump sunderland - watch the goals
text: southampton enjoyed a 4-0 romp at the stadium of light on saturday , their final game before the efl cup final at the end of the month .
you can watch the goals right now with match of the day on the iplayer .
coverage starts 15 minutes and 30 seconds into the show .

documents.title: shooting victim 'critically ill '
text: a man who was shot in waterlooville last night is `` in a critical condition in hospital with life-changing injuries '' , hampshire police has said .
the victim , aged in his 30s , was found in athena avenue at about 00:50 gmt .
a man and a woman were arrested about an hour and a half later at an address in havant , and are being held on sus of attempted murder .
police remain at the crime scene this morning , to `` reassure the public '' and continue investigations .

documents.title: council spends more than £ 1.3m on property advisors
text: portsmouth city council has spent more than £ 1.3m on consultants to help add to its growing property portfolio .
portsmouth city council has spent more than £ 1.3m on property consultants

documents.title: man arrested over 'handgun ' incident
text: a man has been arrested in weymouth on sus of possessing an imitation firearm with intent to cause fear of violence .
dorset police were called at 20:43 gmt on saturday to a report of a man carrying a handgun in magnolia close .
armed police searched the area but nothing was found .
on sunday afternoon , a 22-year-old weymouth man was arrested and an imitation firearm was recovered .

documents.title: racing yacht 'hit by rogue wave '
text: a racing yacht , whose 14 crew were rescued from the atlantic by a royal navy destroyer , was dismasted by a `` rogue wave '' , the vessel 's owner has said .
clyde challenger sent an emergency beacon alert which was up by the uk coastguard at 20:00 gmt on thursday .
after several unsuccessful rescue attempts by other vessels , the type 45 destroyer hms dragon arrived on the scene on saturday at 14:45 gmt and up the sailors by sea boat .
the crew suffered minor injuries and the yacht was scuttled .

documents.title: councillor 'loses most of home to fire '
text: a test valley councillor says he `` lost two-thirds of his home '' in a fire on saturday evening .

nick adams-king , a former conservative candidate for dorset police and crime commissioner , said he and his family were having dinner when the house alarms went off , and they found the upstairs filled with smoke .
mr adams-king said : `` my 10-year-old sat in a car in the dark for three hours singing songs to my six-year-old while the fire service dealt with the blaze .
the children were incredibly brave . ''
mr king said he believed his wood-burner flue had set fire to the rafters of the house in awbridge near romsey .

documents.title: six-year-old pupil 'missing for more than an hour '
text: a six-year-old boy is reported to have escaped a southampton primary school by crawling under a gate in order to find his mother .
school put on lockdown after six-year-old pupil went missing

documents.title: police mount patrols following shooting
text: police are mounting extra patrols in waterlooville following last night 's shooting in athena avenue , which has left a man with serious head injuries .
a man and a woman were arrested in havant on sus of attempted murder , following the shooting at about 00:50 gmt .
det supt darren rawlings said : `` local people will see a lot of officers and police activity in the area today as we both look to reassure the community and investigate the crime . ''
police have appealing for witnesses to contact them , quoting operation endorse .

documents.title: travel : a34 delays following accident
text: travel : a34 southbound , 25 min delay to j9 of m3 at winchester .
accident at winnall interchange .

documents.title: weather : brightening up , windy
text: bee tucker has the forecast for the south .

documents.title: breakingtwo arrested after shooting in waterlooville
text: a man and a woman have been arrested on sus of attempted murder after the shooting of another man in waterlooville early this morning .
the victim , aged in his 30s , is being treated in hospital for a serious head injury following the incident in athena avenue at about 00:50 gmt .
officers , including armed police , arrested a 37-year-old man and a 38-year-old woman at an address in high lawn way , havant at about 02:25 gmt .

documents.title: headlines : pair arrested following shooting
text: headlines : pair arrested following shooting

documents.title: woman dies after second hampshire flat fall incident in two days
text: a woman has died after falling from the window of a third floor flat .
the 40-year-old woman died from her injuries after the fall from a portsmouth flat on sunday 12 february at about 09:40 gmt .
she was taken from the property in clarendon road , southsea to southampton general hospital where she later died from her injuries .
it comes a day after a woman suffered serious injuries after a flat fall in southampton .
hampshire police trying to determine what caused both women to fall confirmed they were not currently linking the incidents and urged any witnesses to come forward .

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to our local live service for dorset , hampshire and the isle of wight on monday .
we 'll be bringing you the latest headlines from across the three counties .
you can get in touch too , via email , on our hampshire and dorset facebook pages or on twitter @ bbc hampshire and @ bbcdorset .
